beginners.title: Beginner's Guide
beginners.subtitle: Learn step-by-step how to use Azera CRM Automation and API Key features

automationsSection.title: What are Automations?
automationsSection.desc: Automations allow you to configure automatic actions based on system events. For example: when a new lead is created, automatically send a welcome email or create a task for the responsible salesperson.

1.title: Access Settings
1.desc: In the side menu, click on 'Settings' and then on 'Automations'

2.title: Choose Automation Type
2.desc: Select between: New Lead, Converted Lead, Task Created, etc.

3.title: Configure Conditions
3.desc: Define when the automation should run (e.g., when a lead is created)

4.title: Define Actions
4.desc: Choose what should happen: send email, create task, update status, or make HTTP request

5.title: Configure Headers and Body (if using HTTP)
5.desc: For HTTP actions: configure Authorization Bearer and JSON data in the body

6.title: Test the Automation
6.desc: Run a test to verify everything works correctly

7.title: Activate Automation
7.desc: Put the automation into production by clicking the 'Activate' button

tips.title: üí° Important Tips
list: Always test your automations before activating
Use specific conditions to avoid unwanted actions
Monitor execution logs to identify problems
Start with simple automations and evolve
For HTTP actions: configure headers with 'Bearer TOKEN' and body in JSON

httpConfig.title: Configuring Headers and Body in HTTP Automations

whenToUse.title: üåê When to use HTTP actions
whenToUse.desc: In automations, you can configure actions that make HTTP requests to external systems, such as sending data to webhooks, integrating with other CRMs, or triggering chatbots.

headers.title: üìã HTTP Headers in Automations
headers.desc: Configure headers the same way as in manual APIs:

body.title: üì¶ Body Template in Automations
body.desc: Use dynamic data from the lead/event that triggered the automation:

vars.title: üîß Available Variables:
list: Lead ID
Lead Name
Lead Email
Phone
Current date/time
User name who created

example.title: üìã HTTP Automation Example
example.scenario: Scenario: New lead created ‚Üí Send to chatbot

result.title: ‚ö° Result:
result.desc: Whenever a new lead is created, the chatbot will automatically receive a personalized message with the lead data, without manual intervention!

apiSection.title: What are API Keys?
apiSection.desc: API keys allow external systems to connect to Azera CRM securely. With them, you can integrate the CRM with other services, such as chatbots, email systems, marketing tools, etc.

1.title: Access API Keys
1.desc: In the side menu, click on 'Settings' and then on 'API Keys'

2.title: Click 'New Key'
2.desc: Give a descriptive name for your API key (e.g., 'WhatsApp Integration')

3.title: Configure Permissions
3.desc: Select which operations the key can perform: read, write, etc.

4.title: Set Expiry (Optional)
4.desc: Set an expiration date for greater security

5.title: Copy and Save the Key
5.desc: The key will be shown only once. Copy and keep it in a safe place!

6.title: Use in your Integration
6.desc: Include the key in the 'Authorization' header of your requests

8.title: Prepare JSON Body
8.desc: Structure the data in the correct JSON format for each endpoint

config.title: üîß How to Configure Headers and Body

headers.title: üìã HTTP Headers (required)
headers.desc: Headers are information sent along with your request. The most important is the Authorization with your API key.

body.title: üì¶ Body Template (data)
body.desc: The body contains the data you want to send. It must be in valid JSON format.

tips.title: üí° Important Tips:
list: Always use 'Bearer ' before the API key in the Authorization header
Content-Type must be 'application/json' for JSON data
Check if the JSON is valid (no extra commas, correct quotes)
Required fields vary by endpoint - consult documentation

security.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è API Key Security
list: Never share your API keys in public code
Use environment variables to store keys
Revoke suspicious keys immediately
Configure minimum necessary permissions
Monitor key usage regularly
Always use HTTPS for all requests
Validate body JSON before sending

requests.title: Azera CRM API
requests.subtitle: Complete documentation for integration with the REST API

start.overviewDesc: The Azera CRM API allows you to integrate your systems and applications with all CRM data. Access leads, properties, tasks, and reports through secure and authenticated REST endpoints.
start.quickStartStep1: Access the Credentials tab and copy your Tenant ID and API Key
start.quickStartStep2: Choose an example in the Examples tab
start.quickStartStep3: Configure the request in your server or application

start.importantDesc: All requests must include your Tenant ID as a query parameter and your API Key in the header. Never share your credentials or expose your API Key in client-side code.

credentials.securityDesc: Keep your credentials safe. Never share your API Key or include it in code that runs in the browser. Use environment variables on your server.

slide1.title: Welcome to Azera!
slide1.description: This is our first version and we are very happy to have you here. Let's show you how everything works.

slide2.title: How does Azera work?
slide2.description: The CRM works through teams. You can create your own team or join an existing team via an invite.

slide3.title: Creating your Team
slide3.description: On the "My Team" screen, you can create a new team, define company name, and start inviting members to collaborate.

slide4.title: Invite your Team
slide4.description: Invite brokers and collaborators by email. Define permissions and organize your team to work collaboratively.

slide5.title: Customize your Profile
slide5.description: Access "Settings" to edit your personal information, profile picture, contact details, and system preferences.

subscription.title: Choose your Plan
subscription.subtitle: Start your 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

q1.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no cancellation fees.

q2.question: What is the free trial period?
q2.answer: We offer 14 days free. If you don't like it, cancel at no cost. If you like it, you will be charged at the end of the period.

q3.question: How does upgrade work?
q3.answer: You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. We will adjust the value of your next invoice.

q4.question: Do you offer annual discount?
q4.answer: Yes! Pay annually and save 2 months of subscription. Contact our support.

banner.title: Secure Free Trial
banner.description: You won't be charged during the 14-day trial. You will receive a reminder 3 days before billing.

hero.subtitle: Everything you or your team needs to manage leads, products, and teams in one place.

automation.title: Intelligent Automation
automation.description: Automate follow-ups, lead distribution, and repetitive tasks with advanced AI and powerful webhooks.

pipeline.title: Advanced Visual Pipeline
pipeline.description: Organize your sales funnel with intuitive Kanban, real-time metrics, and smart filters.

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: Complete team management with granular permissions and individual performance tracking.

useCases.title: Made for all types of business
useCases.subtitle: From freelancers to large enterprises, Azera adapts to your workflow and scales with your growth.

freelancer.title: Freelancers
freelancer.description: Fully adapt the CRM to your needs with custom fields for each client. Receive smart automatic reminders to never miss an important follow-up. Access simple and intuitive reports to track your progress and optimize your financial results.

teams.title: Teams & Companies
teams.description: Automatically distribute leads to maximize your team's efficiency and productivity. Monitor individual performance with custom dashboards and real-time metrics. Control permissions granularly to ensure security, organization, and compliance across the company.

fullFeatures.title: All in one place
fullFeatures.subtitle: Complete, universal, and scalable CRM for any type of business.

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.description: 15+ field types (text, number, date, list, file, etc.) to fully adapt to your business

responsive.title: 100% Responsive
responsive.description: Interface optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile. Work from anywhere with real-time synchronization

security.title: Maximum Security
security.description: Row Level Security (RLS), end-to-end encryption, daily automatic backups, and multi-tenant isolation

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.description: Complete task system with priorities, checklists, automatic reminders, and progress tracking

integrations.title: Unlimited Integrations
integrations.description: Unlimited webhooks, full REST APIs, custom API Keys. Integrate with Zapier, Make, n8n, and any system

reports.title: Real-time Reports
reports.description: Interactive dashboards with conversion metrics, team performance, and sales funnel analysis updated in real-time

pricing.title: Simple and direct plans
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and scale as your team grows.

customPlans.text: Need specific features or larger volumes?

q1.question: Does Azera work for any type of business?
q1.answer: Yes! Although optimized for real estate, Azera is a universal CRM with customizable fields that adapts to any business model: consulting, e-commerce, services, B2B, etc.

q2.question: Do I need a credit card to test?
q2.answer: No! You can start on the free plan immediately. Only when you decide to upgrade to Pro or Enterprise will you need to add payment details.

q3.question: Are my data safe?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We use multi-tenant isolation with Row Level Security (RLS), end-to-end encryption, daily automatic backups, and tier 1 cloud infrastructure (Supabase/AWS).

q4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q4.answer: Yes, no fines or fees. You can cancel your subscription anytime and continue using it until the end of the paid period. Your data is saved for 90 days if you decide to come back.

q5.question: Do you offer training?
q5.answer: Yes! We have complete documentation, tutorial videos, and guided onboarding. Pro clients have priority support, and Enterprise includes personalized training for the team.

q6.question: Can I integrate with other tools?
q6.answer: Yes! We offer unlimited webhooks, full REST APIs, and custom API Keys. You can integrate with any system: Zapier, Make, n8n, email marketing platforms, ERPs, etc.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Have any questions? Want a custom version for your company?

footer.tagline: The CRM that turns teams into result machines.
